title: Server issues again??
body: I was disconnected from my game and could not get back on for a while.  Went to check boards and it took a while to load as well.  All other sites and apps are running normally.  Any ideas??  It is not fair that we lose points for server issues.  Help?

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a record of service issues during the time you specified. It's possible this was more of a regional or ISP-specific issue. If you're still having issues connecting, I'd recommend ensuring your local network settings are optimized for League by following our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if your issue persists.
this happened to me as well. i played an aram game and 15 mins in got disconnected. wifi/internet was working fine just not league. sadly i got a LEAVE game. i just hope i dont get penalized
Now I am getting a "Sorry, we're unable to load this content right now - RETRY" on the splash page.

Adding on, it happened exactly at 12am EDT.  One other thing I noticed was I could not connect to chat and had to try several times.  The client also did a quick auto patch when i restarted it.  Now I am getting a pvp connection error intermittently.  I guess I'll hold off on ranked until someone can take a look.
